comment.author: Hanna
comment.text: If you support trump, you're either mentally handicapped or a nihilist. If you don't know what the second is, you're the first.

replies.author: Hanna
replies.text: Oh, I know. Good thing Trump has all the best words. Down with syllables.

replies.author: Kaitlynn
replies.text: This comment makes my soul happy.

replies.author: Summer
replies.text: If you support Hillary, then you are a murderer, liar, cheat, fraud.

replies.author: Kaitlynn
replies.text: Summer, how does supporting a candidate make you those things? The logic of some people.....
